title: User Account Creation
description: As a new user, I want to create an account, so that I can access personalized features on the platform.
attributes_and_rules: Must include email and mobile number verification.
acceptance_criteria: User can successfully register with valid email and mobile number, verification codes are sent to provided contact details.
test_cases: Given a new user, when they provide valid email and mobile number, then the system should send verification codes to both.

title: User Login
description: As a returning user, I want to log in using my credentials, so that I can access my account.
acceptance_criteria: User can log in using valid credentials, session is created upon successful login.
test_cases: Given a returning user, when they provide valid credentials, then the system should allow access and create a session.

title: Social Login Options
description: As a user, I want to log in using my Google or Facebook account, so that I have an easier way to access the platform.
attributes_and_rules: Integrate Google and Facebook OAuth for authentication.
acceptance_criteria: User can log in using valid Google or Facebook account, new account is created if it does not exist.
test_cases: Given a user with a Google or Facebook account, when they opt to log in using social login, then the system should authenticate via OAuth and grant access.
